verses.verse: Now it came to pass, when <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%>, and <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%>, and <S%H1654>Geshem<s%> the <S%H6163>Arabian<s%>, and the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of our <S%H341>enemies<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> that I had <S%H1129>builded<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, and that there was no <S%H6556>breach<s%> <S%H3498>left<s%> therein; <S%H1571%H5704>(though<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> I had not set <S%H5975>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> upon the <S%H8179>gates<s%>;)

That <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> and <S%H1654>Geshem<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, let us <S%H3259>meet<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> in some one of the <S%H3715>villages<s%> in the <S%H1237>plain<s%> of <S%H207>Ono<s%>. But they <S%H2803>thought<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> me <S%H7451>mischief<s%>.

And I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> unto them, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I am <S%H6213>doing<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>, so that I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%>: why should the <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H7673>cease<s%>, <S%H834>whilst<s%> I <S%H7503>leave<s%> it, and come <S%H3381>down<s%> to you?
Yet they <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto me <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> after this <S%H1697>sort<s%>; and I <S%H7725>answered<s%> them after the same <S%H1697>manner<s%>.

Then <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> his <S%H5288>servant<s%> unto me in like <S%H1697>manner<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> with an <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H107>letter<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>;

Wherein was <S%H3789>written<s%>, It is <S%H8085>reported<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and <S%H1654>Gashmu<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> it, that thou and the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H2803>think<s%> to <S%H4775>rebel<s%>: for which <S%H3651>cause<s%> thou <S%H1129>buildest<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H1933>be<s%> their <S%H4428>king<s%>, according to these <S%H1697>words<s%>.

And thou hast also <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> to <S%H7121>preach<s%> of thee at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, There is a <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: and now shall it be <S%H8085>reported<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> according to these <S%H1697>words<s%>. <S%H3212>Come<s%> now therefore, and let us take <S%H3289>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

Then I <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, There <S%H1961>are<s%> no such <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H1961>done<s%> as thou <S%H559>sayest<s%>, but thou <S%H908>feignest<s%> them out of thine own <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

For they all made us <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Their <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be <S%H7503>weakened<s%> from the <S%H4399>work<s%>, that it be not <S%H6213>done<s%>. Now therefore, O God, <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

Afterward I <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1806>Delaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4105>Mehetabeel<s%>, who was shut <S%H6113>up<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us meet <S%H3259>together<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%>, and let us <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple<s%>: for they will <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2026>slay<s%> thee; yea, in the <S%H3915>night<s%> will they <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2026>slay<s%> thee.

And I <S%H559>said<s%>, Should <S%H3644>such<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> as I <S%H1272>flee<s%>? and who is there, that, being as I am, would <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H1964>temple<s%> to save his <S%H2425>life<s%>? I will not go <S%H935>in<s%>.

And, lo, I <S%H5234>perceived<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> had not <S%H7971>sent<s%> him; but that he <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> this <S%H5016>prophecy<s%> against me: for <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> and <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> had <S%H7936>hired<s%> him.

Therefore was he <S%H7936>hired<s%>, that I should be <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, and do <S%H6213>so<s%>, and <S%H2398>sin<s%>, and that they might have matter for an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8034>report<s%>, that they might <S%H2778>reproach<s%> me.

My <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H2142>think<s%> thou upon <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> and <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> according to these their <S%H4639>works<s%>, and on the <S%H5031>prophetess<s%> <S%H5129>Noadiah<s%>, and the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, that would have put me in <S%H3372>fear<s%>.
¶ So the <S%H2346>wall<s%> was <S%H7999>finished<s%> in the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H2568>fifth<s%> day of the month <S%H435>Elul<s%>, in <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And it came to pass, that when all our <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> thereof, and all the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that were about <S%H5439>us<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> these things, they were <S%H3966>much<s%> cast <S%H5307>down<s%> in their own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: for they <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that this <S%H4399>work<s%> was <S%H6213>wrought<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>.

¶ Moreover in those <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1980>sent<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H107>letters<s%> unto <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%>, and the letters of <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto them.

For there were <S%H7227>many<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1167%H7621>sworn<s%> unto him, because he was the son in <S%H2860>law<s%> of <S%H7935>Shechaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H733>Arah<s%>; and his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3076>Johanan<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%>.

Also they <S%H559>reported<s%> his good <S%H2896>deeds<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, and <S%H3318>uttered<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> to him. And <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H107>letters<s%> to put me in <S%H3372>fear<s%>.
